member.name: M:HungarianAlgorithm.Extensions.ArrayExtensions.SquareArray``1(``0[][])
member.summary: Creates a new , having equal elements for both dimensions. Rows or columns added is filled with null values.
member.typeparam: The type of elements in the array.

member.name: M:HungarianAlgorithm.HungarianAlgorithm.FindAssignments(System.Int32[0:,0:])
member.summary: Finds the optimal assignments for a given matrix of agents and costed tasks such that the total cost is minimized.
member.param: A cost matrix; the element at row i and column j represents the cost of agent i performing task j.
member.returns: A matrix of assignments; the value of element i is the column of the task assigned to agent i.
